dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: stratumMethod
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table links a set of strata to a sampling protocol . This table when combined with the stratumType table defines the various stratum methods that a plot author might select to define the strata recognied in a plot.

attribute.attNotes: Primary Key for the stratumMethod table.
attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique stratum methodology.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the citation table
attribute.attDefinition: Link to a publication defining the stratum method.
Name of the stratum method (e.g., Braun-Blanquet, TNC-ABI, NC Vegetation Survey #1, NC Vegetation Survey #2, etc.)

This field describes the general method. For example, are the strata defined as including all foliage on plants that predominantly occupy a certain stratum regardless of the height of that foliage, or only the foliage that actually occurs within a specified vertical slice of the community.
